titles.title: To modify the project for flood control, San Timoteo Creek, California, to permit the non-Federal contribution for certain costs of the project to be made after completion of the project.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 3/18/1997--Introduced. Modifies the project for flood control, San Timoteo Creek, California, to permit the non-Federal contribution for certain project costs to be made, with interest, over a period to be determined by the non-Federal sponsor, but not to exceed 30 years after project completion.
